body: This one can be queried through registry. It's stored in somewhere like `Computer\HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Installer\UserData\S-1-5-18\Components\2221AD5AF46D01746B10434547D0B4F7`.
